info.name: Foodfolk tags
info.description: The Foodfolk tags to create Foodfolk from The Tasty Lands of Silverplate

description.p: Food People are those whose bondy consists of solid materials. They have been fighting for their place in Silverplate since the First Age.

Cold preserves your body to a certain extent. You have resistance to cold damage and you are unharmed by temperatures as low as -20 degrees Fahrenheit. Also, your Constitution score increases by 1, up to a maximum of 20.

sheet.description: You are unharmed by temperatures as low as -20 degrees Fahrenheit.

description.p: Food People are those whose bondy consists of solid materials. They have been fighting for their place in Silverplate since the First Age.
Your body consists of solid material and thus is durable. You have proficiency in Constitution saving throws.
Food People are those whose bondy consists of solid materials. They have been fighting for their place in Silverplate since the First Age.

. Your eyes are used to the natural darkness of the realm. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

sheet.description: Darkvision for 60 feet.

description.p: Food People are those whose bondy consists of solid materials. They have been fighting for their place in Silverplate since the First Age.
You are taught the ancient ways of the food people. You are proficient in one of the following skills of your choice: Animal Handling, Athletics, and Survival.
Food People are those whose bondy consists of solid materials. They have been fighting for their place in Silverplate since the First Age.
You are taught the ancient ways of the food people. You are proficient with one of the following tools of your choice: cook's utensils, potter's tools, or mason's tools.
Food People are those whose bondy consists of solid materials. They have been fighting for their place in Silverplate since the First Age.
You know the language spoken among food; Yummish.
Food People are those whose bondy consists of solid materials. They have been fighting for their place in Silverplate since the First Age.

You have a keen sense of smell. As an action, you can sense the presence of foodfolk within 30 feet of you and can tell if they are a food or a beverage. This feature doesn't reveal the creatures' location or number. Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

sheet.description: You have a keen sense of smell. As an action, you can sense the presence of foodfolk within 30 feet of you and can tell if they are a food or a beverage. This feature doesn't reveal the creatures' location or number. Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

description.p: Beverage people are those whose bondy consists of liquid materials. They are mostly one with their vessels and usually cant live outside of them.

You can live without a vessel. As an action, you can leave the vessel you are in. When you do so, you can survive for a number of hours equal to your level. If you are outside of your vessel for more than a number of hours equal to your level, you suffer one level of exhaustion for every hour that exceeds your level. To elaborate, if you are a 5th level creature, you suffer one level of exhaustion at the beginning of the sixth hour you spend outside of your vessel, and another level of exhaustion at the beginning of the seventh hour. When you are in liquid form, you leave every item you're carrying and wearing behind. Your walking speed doesn't change and you can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. Also, while motionless, you are indistinguishable from non-living liquids. You can still talk while in liquid form but can't take the Attack action. Your empty vessel counts as an unattended object.
As an action, you can choose an unattended object within 5 feet of you and enter it, using it as a new vessel.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.
Additionally, you have resistace to fire damage in both your forms since you are attuned to your liquid form.

sheet.description: As an action, you can leave the vessel you are in. When you do so, you can survive for a number of hours equal to your level. If you are outside of your vessel for more than a number of hours equal to your level, you suffer one level of exhaustion for every hour that exceeds your level. To elaborate, if you are a 5th level creature, you suffer one level of exhaustion at the beginning of the sixth hour you spend outside of your vessel, and another level of exhaustion at the beginning of the seventh hour. When you are in liquid form, you leave every item you're carrying and wearing behind. Your walking speed doesn't change and you can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. Also, while motionless, you are indistinguishable from non-living liquids. You can still talk while in liquid form but can't take the Attack action. Your empty vessel counts as an unattended object. As an action, you can choose an unattended object within 5 feet of you and enter it, using it as a new vessel. Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

description.p: Beverage people are those whose bondy consists of liquid materials. They are mostly one with their vessels and usually cant live outside of them.
No matter what vessel you are in, your body is fluid and is thus flexible. You have proficiency in Dexterity saving throws.
Beverage people are those whose bondy consists of liquid materials. They are mostly one with their vessels and usually cant live outside of them.

Your eyes are used to the natural darkness of the realm. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

sheet.description: Darkvision 60 feet.

description.p: Beverage people are those whose bondy consists of liquid materials. They are mostly one with their vessels and usually cant live outside of them.
You are taught the ancient ways of the beverage people. You are proficient in one of the following skills of your choice: Persuasion, Stealth, or Survival.
Beverage people are those whose bondy consists of liquid materials. They are mostly one with their vessels and usually cant live outside of them.
You are taught the ancient ways of beverage people. You are proficient with one of the following tools of your choice: brewer's supplies, glassblower's tools, or cartographer's tools.
Beverage people are those whose bondy consists of liquid materials. They are mostly one with their vessels and usually cant live outside of them.
You know the language spoken among the beverage people; Beveric.
Beverage people are those whose bondy consists of liquid materials. They are mostly one with their vessels and usually cant live outside of them.

You can hide your smell by covering yourself as a bonus action. To be able to cover yourself, you need a free hand. As long as you are covering yourself, you don't have a smell and count as invisible to creatures who only rely on smell as a way of perception.

sheet.description: You can hide your smell by covering yourself as a bonus action. To be able to cover yourself, you need a free hand. As long as you are covering yourself, you don't have a smell and count as invisible to creatures who only rely on smell as a way of perception.

description.p: Bitterness may seem like an unpleasant taste, but it provides one with very powerful abilites. The taste of bitter folk gives them the advantage in combat aas well as an opportunity to lead a healthier life than most.
Your body contains components that promote your well-being. Whenever you gain a level, your hit point maximum increases by an additional ld4 hit points.

sheet.description: Whenever you gain a level, your hit point maximum increases by an additional ld4 hit points.

description.p: Bitterness may seem like an unpleasant taste, but it provides one with very powerful abilites. The taste of bitter folk gives them the advantage in combat aas well as an opportunity to lead a healthier life than most.
You can harm others with your bitterness. Your successful weapon attacks deal an extra 1 poison damage. This damage increases by 1 at 4th, 8th, 12th, and 16th level.

sheet.description: Your successful weapon attacks deal an extra 1 poison damage.
Your successful weapon attacks deal an extra 2 poison damage.
Your successful weapon attacks deal an extra 3 poison damage.
Your successful weapon attacks deal an extra 4 poison damage.
Your successful weapon attacks deal an extra 5 poison damage.

description.p: Bitterness may seem like an unpleasant taste, but it provides one with very powerful abilites. The taste of bitter folk gives them the advantage in combat aas well as an opportunity to lead a healthier life than most.
Facing bitter realities has sharpened your mind. You have advantage on Intelligence saving throws.

sheet.description: You have advantage on Intelligence saving throws.

description.p: Bitterness may seem like an unpleasant taste, but it provides one with very powerful abilites. The taste of bitter folk gives them the advantage in combat aas well as an opportunity to lead a healthier life than most.
Bitterness comes with the knowledge to help others. You are proficient in the Medicine skill.

Bitterness may seem like an unpleasant taste, but it provides one with very powerful abilites. The taste of bitter folk gives them the advantage in combat aas well as an opportunity to lead a healthier life than most.
Thanks to your bitter (almost alcoholic) presence, you have advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks in inns and taverns.

sheet.description: You have advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks in inns and taverns.

description.p: Bitterness may seem like an unpleasant taste, but it provides one with very powerful abilites. The taste of bitter folk gives them the advantage in combat aas well as an opportunity to lead a healthier life than most.
You don't have disadvantage on ability checks while frightened.

sheet.description: You don't have disadvantage on ability checks while frightened.

description.p: Bitterness may seem like an unpleasant taste, but it provides one with very powerful abilites. The taste of bitter folk gives them the advantage in combat aas well as an opportunity to lead a healthier life than most.
Choose a skill in which you are proficient at the end of each long rest. You have advantage on the next check you make with that skill.

sheet.description: Choose a skill in which you are proficient at the end of each long rest. You have advantage on the next check you make with that skill.

description.p: Sweet folk are usually energetic and full of life. They ususally make good teammates and use their variety of powers to help others.

You can candify your body, making it harder, without using an action. When you choose to do so, you gain a +1 bonus to AC for 10 minutes. Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.
This bonus becomes +2 when you reach 10th level and +3 when you reach 18th level.

sheet.description: You can candify your body, making it harder, without using an action. When you choose to do so, you gain a +1 bonus to AC for 10 minutes. Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

You can candify your body, making it harder, without using an action. When you choose to do so, you gain a +2 bonus to AC for 10 minutes. Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

You can candify your body, making it harder, without using an action. When you choose to do so, you gain a +3 bonus to AC for 10 minutes. Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

description.p: Sweet folk are usually energetic and full of life. They ususally make good teammates and use their variety of powers to help others.

You can energize yourself in the moment at the cost of wearing yourself out later. On your turn, you can take one additional action and gain one level of exhaustion. That action can be used only to take the Attack (one weapon attack only), Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use an Object action. You can only use this feature once on a single turn.

sheet.description: On your turn, you can take one additional action and gain one level of exhaustion. That action can be used only to take the Attack (one weapon attack only), Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use an Object action. You can only use this feature once on a single turn.

description.p: Sweet folk are usually energetic and full of life. They ususally make good teammates and use their variety of powers to help others.
Your body is made of jelly. You can extend your limbs by 5 feet. While making a melee attack, you can increase your reach by 5 feet.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain any expended uses when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: While making a melee attack, you can increase your reach by 5 feet.

description.p: Sweet folk are usually energetic and full of life. They ususally make good teammates and use their variety of powers to help others.
Your sweetness cannot be breached. You have advantage on Charisma saving throws.

sheet.description: You have advantage on Charisma saving throws.

description.p: Sweet folk are usually energetic and full of life. They ususally make good teammates and use their variety of powers to help others.
You are intensely sweet. Whenever a creature hits you with a bite attack, it takes 1 poison damage.

sheet.description: Whenever a creature hits you with a bite attack, it takes 1 poison damage.

description.p: Sweet folk are usually energetic and full of life. They ususally make good teammates and use their variety of powers to help others.
Your sugary existence makes you an irresistible delight. You have advantage on Charisma checks while romancing another creature.

sheet.description: You have advantage on Charisma checks while romancing another creature.

description.p: Sweet folk are usually energetic and full of life. They ususally make good teammates and use their variety of powers to help others.

Your words can sooth a friend in hard times. When a friendly creature that you can see within 30 feet of you makes a saving throw against being frightened, you can grant advantage on the saving throw as a reaction.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

sheet.description: When a friendly creature that you can see within 30 feet of you makes a saving throw against being frightened, you can grant advantage on the saving throw as a reaction.

description.p: The mouth-puckering sensation of sourness can be overwhelming. But such a sensation is necessary in a world where unpleasant realities are just as prominent as the pleasant ones.
Since your body alreadAcidic Affincontains acidic components, you have resistance to acid damage.
Additionally, when a creature within 5 feet of you hits you with a weapon attack, the creature takes 1 acid damage. This damage increases by 1 at 4th, 8th, 12th, and 16th level.

sheet.description: When a creature within 5 feet of you hits you with a weapon attack, the creature takes 1 acid damage.
When a creature within 5 feet of you hits you with a weapon attack, the creature takes 2 acid damage.
When a creature within 5 feet of you hits you with a weapon attack, the creature takes 3 acid damage.
When a creature within 5 feet of you hits you with a weapon attack, the creature takes 4 acid damage.
When a creature within 5 feet of you hits you with a weapon attack, the creature takes 5 acid damage.

description.p: The mouth-puckering sensation of sourness can be overwhelming. But such a sensation is necessary in a world where unpleasant realities are just as prominent as the pleasant ones.
You have advantage on Constitution saving throws.

sheet.description: You have advantage on Constitution saving throws.

description.p: The mouth-puckering sensation of sourness can be overwhelming. But such a sensation is necessary in a world where unpleasant realities are just as prominent as the pleasant ones.
You can be very sharp when you need to be. You have advantage on Charisma (Intimidation) checks.

sheet.description: You have advantage on Charisma (Intimidation) checks.

description.p: The mouth-puckering sensation of sourness can be overwhelming. But such a sensation is necessary in a world where unpleasant realities are just as prominent as the pleasant ones.
.Your body naturally fights off disease. You have immunity to diseases.

sheet.description: You have immunity to diseases.

description.p: The mouth-puckering sensation of sourness can be overwhelming. But such a sensation is necessary in a world where unpleasant realities are just as prominent as the pleasant ones.
Thanks to your self-healing components, you can live up to 300 years instead of 200 years.

sheet.description: You can live up to 300 years instead of 200 years.

description.p: The mouth-puckering sensation of sourness can be overwhelming. But such a sensation is necessary in a world where unpleasant realities are just as prominent as the pleasant ones.

You can channel your sour smell to irritate others. As a bonus action, you can release your citric essence onto a creature that you can see within 5 feet of you. The target has disadvantage on the next Constitution saving throw it makes within 1 minute to maintain concentration.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

sheet.description: As a bonus action, you can release your citric essence onto a creature that you can see within 5 feet of you. The target has disadvantage on the next Constitution saving throw it makes within 1 minute to maintain concentration.

description.p: The mouth-puckering sensation of sourness can be overwhelming. But such a sensation is necessary in a world where unpleasant realities are just as prominent as the pleasant ones.
You can use your action to stabilize a creature through your touch.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

sheet.description: You can use your action to stabilize a creature through your touch.

description.p: The salt enhances every other flavor, salty folk enhance society with their presence in it. They are mostly jack-of-all-trades sort of folk and are willing to do what must be done.

You can focus all your flavors into one cause. As a reaction, you can choose to gain a +10 bonus to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw of your choice. You can choose to use this feature after you make the roll, but before the GM determines whether the ability check, attack roll, or saving throw succeeds or fails.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest to use it again.

sheet.description: As a reaction, you can choose to gain a +10 bonus to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw of your choice. You can choose to use this feature after you make the roll, but before the GM determines whether the ability check, attack roll, or saving throw succeeds or fails.

description.p: The salt enhances every other flavor, salty folk enhance society with their presence in it. They are mostly jack-of-all-trades sort of folk and are willing to do what must be done.
Being salty, you can make your weapon attacks salty, which requires no action. Salty attacks deal an extra l piercing damage on a hit.
The extra damage increases by 1d4 at 4th, 8th, 12th, and 16th level.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain any expended uses when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can make your weapon attacks salty, which requires no action. Salty attacks deal an extra ld4 piercing damage on a hit.
You can make your weapon attacks salty, which requires no action. Salty attacks deal an extra 2d4 piercing damage on a hit.
You can make your weapon attacks salty, which requires no action. Salty attacks deal an extra 3d4 piercing damage on a hit.
You can make your weapon attacks salty, which requires no action. Salty attacks deal an extra 4d4 piercing damage on a hit.
You can make your weapon attacks salty, which requires no action. Salty attacks deal an extra 5d4 piercing damage on a hit.

description.p: The salt enhances every other flavor, salty folk enhance society with their presence in it. They are mostly jack-of-all-trades sort of folk and are willing to do what must be done.
You have advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

sheet.description: You have advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

description.p: The salt enhances every other flavor, salty folk enhance society with their presence in it. They are mostly jack-of-all-trades sort of folk and are willing to do what must be done.
You are proficient with two kitchen weapons (p.143) of your choice.
The salt enhances every other flavor, salty folk enhance society with their presence in it. They are mostly jack-of-all-trades sort of folk and are willing to do what must be done.
Your components can sustain you longer without food or water. You only need to consume half a pound of food and half a gallon of water per day to be able to survive.

sheet.description: You only need to consume half a pound of food and half a gallon of water per day to be able to survive.

description.p: The salt enhances every other flavor, salty folk enhance society with their presence in it. They are mostly jack-of-all-trades sort of folk and are willing to do what must be done.
Instead of sleeping, you can meditate deeply, remaining semi-conscious, for 6 hours a day. After resting in this way, you gain the benefits of a long rest.

sheet.description: Instead of sleeping, you can meditate deeply, remaining semi-conscious, for 6 hours a day. After resting in this way, you gain the benefits of a long rest.

description.p: The salt enhances every other flavor, salty folk enhance society with their presence in it. They are mostly jack-of-all-trades sort of folk and are willing to do what must be done.
You've had it with empty words. You can choose to have advantage on a Charisma (Intimidation) check.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest to use it again.

sheet.description: You can choose to have advantage on a Charisma (Intimidation) check.

description.p: Savory folk tend to be more physical both in social and combat situations. They are self assured folk who dont shy away from action.
You can increase two ability scores of your choice by 1, up to a maximum of 20. You can't increase the same ability score twice with this feature.
Savory folk tend to be more physical both in social and combat situations. They are self assured folk who dont shy away from action.
Your body is bigger than most. Your size is Large. You can increase your Strength and Constitution scores up to 22, instead of 20.

sheet.description: Your size is Large. You can increase your Strength and Constitution scores up to 22, instead of 20.

description.p: Savory folk tend to be more physical both in social and combat situations. They are self assured folk who dont shy away from action.
You have advantage on Strength saving throws.

sheet.description: You have advantage on Strength saving throws.

description.p: Savory folk tend to be more physical both in social and combat situations. They are self assured folk who dont shy away from action.
If you're planning to return, it's not running away but a tactical retreat. When you take the Disengage action, your speed increases by 10 feet only for that action.

sheet.description: When you take the Disengage action, your speed increases by 10 feet only for that action.

description.p: Savory folk tend to be more physical both in social and combat situations. They are self assured folk who dont shy away from action.
When a creature that you can see within 30 feet of you takes damage, you can enhance the taste of the damage as a reaction, increasing the damage by ld4.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

sheet.description: When a creature that you can see within 30 feet of you takes damage, you can enhance the taste of the damage as a reaction, increasing the damage by ld4.

description.p: Savory folk tend to be more physical both in social and combat situations. They are self assured folk who dont shy away from action.

You are good at remembering the finest details in the most critical moments. As an action, you can recall a piece of information you've read before, an image you've seen before, or anything else you may have come across in the past.
Once you use this feature, you cannot do so again for one week.

sheet.description: As an action, you can recall a piece of information you've read before, an image you've seen before, or anything else you may have come across in the past.

description.p: Savory folk tend to be more physical both in social and combat situations. They are self assured folk who dont shy away from action.
You learn one of the following languages of your choice: Draconic, Giant, or Goblin.

With their lively colors and many contributions they make to their live and everyone else's, fruit folk enrich life aroud them. Whethera tough, succulent strawberry or a delicious, nutritious banana-cream pie, a food with fuit in it is a great addition to the party.
You are colored in the most beautiful tones available in nature. You can cast the blur spell, without expending a spell slot and requiring no components.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain any expended uses when you finish a long rest.
Also, your Charisma score increases by 1, up to a maximum of 20.

sheet.description: You can cast the blur spell, without expending a spell slot and requiring no components.

description.p: With their lively colors and many contributions they make to their live and everyone else's, fruit folk enrich life aroud them. Whethera tough, succulent strawberry or a delicious, nutritious banana-cream pie, a food with fuit in it is a great addition to the party.

You reach forward and use your action to release a blast of pure energy. Every creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC = 8 + your Charisma modifier + your proficiency bonus). A creature takes 2d6 force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again. The damage increases by 1d6 at 4th, 8th, 12th, and 16th level.

sheet.description: As an action, every creature in a 15-foot cone must make a DC {{fructoseblast:dc}} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 2d6 force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

As an action, every creature in a 15-foot cone must make a DC {{fructoseblast:dc}} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

As an action, every creature in a 15-foot cone must make a DC {{fructoseblast:dc}} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 4d6 force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

As an action, every creature in a 15-foot cone must make a DC {{fructoseblast:dc}} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 5d6 force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

As an action, every creature in a 15-foot cone must make a DC {{fructoseblast:dc}} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 6d6 force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

description.p: With their lively colors and many contributions they make to their live and everyone else's, fruit folk enrich life aroud them. Whethera tough, succulent strawberry or a delicious, nutritious banana-cream pie, a food with fuit in it is a great addition to the party.
. As a fruit, your body is made out of pulps. When healed, these pulps react and recover themselves. Whenever you regain hit points, you regain an extra ld4 hit points.

sheet.description: Whenever you regain hit points, you regain an extra ld4 hit points.

description.p: With their lively colors and many contributions they make to their live and everyone else's, fruit folk enrich life aroud them. Whethera tough, succulent strawberry or a delicious, nutritious banana-cream pie, a food with fuit in it is a great addition to the party.
You are full of juice, which you can use as nourishment. By dealing yourself 1 damage, you can produce enough juice to keep a creature sustained for a day.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain any expended uses when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: By dealing yourself 1 damage, you can produce enough juice to keep a creature sustained for a day.

description.p: With their lively colors and many contributions they make to their live and everyone else's, fruit folk enrich life aroud them. Whethera tough, succulent strawberry or a delicious, nutritious banana-cream pie, a food with fuit in it is a great addition to the party.
Your berries protect you in harsh conditions. You can negate the effects of exhaustion for 10 minutes.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

sheet.description: You can negate the effects of exhaustion for 10 minutes.

description.p: With their lively colors and many contributions they make to their live and everyone else's, fruit folk enrich life aroud them. Whethera tough, succulent strawberry or a delicious, nutritious banana-cream pie, a food with fuit in it is a great addition to the party.
There are seeds in your body that prevent your immediate demise. When you roll a 20 on a death saving throw, one of your seeds germinates and you regain 10 hit points.
Once you use this feature, a week has to pass for you to benefit from it again.

sheet.description: When you roll a 20 on a death saving throw, one of your seeds germinates and you regain 10 hit points.

description.p: With their lively colors and many contributions they make to their live and everyone else's, fruit folk enrich life aroud them. Whethera tough, succulent strawberry or a delicious, nutritious banana-cream pie, a food with fuit in it is a great addition to the party.

The flowers you have around your body keep you comfortable in bad weather. You are unharmed by temperatures as low as -20 degrees Fahrenheit. If you have the Preservable feature, you are unharmed by temperatures as low as -70 degrees Fahrenheit.

sheet.description: You are unharmed by temperatures as low as -20 degrees Fahrenheit.
You are unharmed by temperatures as low as -70 degrees Fahrenheit.

description.p: Vegetable foodfolk tend to settle in or around the wilderness. They are sturdy folk who value community, family, and friendship.
Containing one of the most vital ingredients of all food, your Constitution score increases by 1, up to a maximum of 20.

Additionally, as a bonus action, you can choose to have a +10 bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) checks among other vegetables for 10 minutes. Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

sheet.description: As a bonus action, you can choose to have a +10 bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) checks among other vegetables for 10 minutes.

description.p: Vegetable foodfolk tend to settle in or around the wilderness. They are sturdy folk who value community, family, and friendship.

As an action, you draw yourself into your pip, covering yourself with the thick shell of your core. When you do so, you can't move, take any actions, bonus actions, or reactions. The pip has AC 17, 30 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. You return to your normal form when you choose to do so, or when the pip is broken. If the pip is broken as a result of dropping to 0 hit points, any excess damage carries over to you.

sheet.description: As an action, you draw yourself into your pip, covering yourself with the thick shell of your core. When you do so, you can't move, take any actions, bonus actions, or reactions. The pip has AC 17, 30 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. You return to your normal form when you choose to do so, or when the pip is broken. If the pip is broken as a result of dropping to 0 hit points, any excess damage carries over to you.

element.name: Vegetable - Power of the Rooted Ones (4)

description.p: Vegetable foodfolk tend to settle in or around the wilderness. They are sturdy folk who value community, family, and friendship.
You can cast the entangle spell once with this feature, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

sheet.description: You can cast the entangle spell once with this feature, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

description.p: Vegetable foodfolk tend to settle in or around the wilderness. They are sturdy folk who value community, family, and friendship.
You have tremorsense out to a range of 15 feet.

sheet.description: You have tremorsense out to a range of 15 feet.

description.p: Vegetable foodfolk tend to settle in or around the wilderness. They are sturdy folk who value community, family, and friendship.
You are proficient with the herbalism kit.
Vegetable foodfolk tend to settle in or around the wilderness. They are sturdy folk who value community, family, and friendship.

When you finish a long rest while your torso is completely submerged in the ground, you regain 5 temporary hit points. This feature also functions if you finish a long rest in an underground tunnel, a cave, a dungeon, etc.

sheet.description: When you finish a long rest while your torso is completely submerged in the ground, you regain 5 temporary hit points. This feature also functions if you finish a long rest in an underground tunnel, a cave, a dungeon, etc.

description.p: Vegetable foodfolk tend to settle in or around the wilderness. They are sturdy folk who value community, family, and friendship.
You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one other foodfolk with the Vegetable tag that isn't incapacitated is within 5 feet of the creature.

sheet.description: You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one other foodfolk with the Vegetable tag that isn't incapacitated is within 5 feet of the creature.

description.p: Sturdy, filling, brave folk that are great with weapons, grains are an indispensable part of Silverplate. They are filled with energy and cautious when they need to be; with the ability to be deliciously chewy as well as delectably crunchy. They tend to be down to earth folk, though their wrath is to be avoided.
You can have resistance to one of the following damage types of your choice; bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing.

Sturdy, filling, brave folk that are great with weapons, grains are an indispensable part of Silverplate. They are filled with energy and cautious when they need to be; with the ability to be deliciously chewy as well as delectably crunchy. They tend to be down to earth folk, though their wrath is to be avoided.
You are proficient with the great frying pan, the frying pan, the rolling pin, and the hand mixers.

Sturdy, filling, brave folk that are great with weapons, grains are an indispensable part of Silverplate. They are filled with energy and cautious when they need to be; with the ability to be deliciously chewy as well as delectably crunchy. They tend to be down to earth folk, though their wrath is to be avoided.
When you take fire damage, your next successful attack within 1 minute deals an extra 1d6 fire damage.

sheet.description: When you take fire damage, your next successful attack within 1 minute deals an extra 1d6 fire damage.

description.p: Sturdy, filling, brave folk that are great with weapons, grains are an indispensable part of Silverplate. They are filled with energy and cautious when they need to be; with the ability to be deliciously chewy as well as delectably crunchy. They tend to be down to earth folk, though their wrath is to be avoided.
As a bonus action, you transform into a whole grain form of yourself, regaining hit points equal to ld4 + your Wisdom modifier.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain any expended uses when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: As a bonus action, you transform into a whole grain form of yourself, regaining hit points equal to 1d4 + {{wisdom:modifier}}

description.p: Sturdy, filling, brave folk that are great with weapons, grains are an indispensable part of Silverplate. They are filled with energy and cautious when they need to be; with the ability to be deliciously chewy as well as delectably crunchy. They tend to be down to earth folk, though their wrath is to be avoided.
Your body is glutenous. You can extend your limbs by 5 feet. While making a melee attack, you can increase your reach by 5 feet.

sheet.description: While making a melee attack, you can increase your reach by 5 feet.

description.p: Sturdy, filling, brave folk that are great with weapons, grains are an indispensable part of Silverplate. They are filled with energy and cautious when they need to be; with the ability to be deliciously chewy as well as delectably crunchy. They tend to be down to earth folk, though their wrath is to be avoided.
You have a climbing speed of 20 feet.

Sturdy, filling, brave folk that are great with weapons, grains are an indispensable part of Silverplate. They are filled with energy and cautious when they need to be; with the ability to be deliciously chewy as well as delectably crunchy. They tend to be down to earth folk, though their wrath is to be avoided.
While trying to keep your balance on narrow surfaces, you have advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks.

sheet.description: While trying to keep your balance on narrow surfaces, you have advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks.

description.p: Meat is chock full of protein in addition to containing many healthy minerals and nutrients. Cooked or raw, fatty or lean; there are many stories in Silverplate where pieces of meat star as the brave heroes.
You have proficiency in Strength saving throws.
Also, as a bonus action, you can choose to increase your Strength score by 2 for 1 minute, up to a maximum of 30.
You can benefit from this feature only once at a time. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain any expended uses when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: As a bonus action, you can choose to increase your Strength score by 2 for 1 minute, up to a maximum of 30. You can benefit from this feature only once at a time.

description.p: Meat is chock full of protein in addition to containing many healthy minerals and nutrients. Cooked or raw, fatty or lean; there are many stories in Silverplate where pieces of meat star as the brave heroes.
While you are wearing no armor, your AC is equal to 12 + your Dexterity modifier. You can still benefit from wielding a shield.

Meat is chock full of protein in addition to containing many healthy minerals and nutrients. Cooked or raw, fatty or lean; there are many stories in Silverplate where pieces of meat star as the brave heroes.

When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the enlarge/reduce spell once with this feature, using only the spell's enlarging effects, and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

sheet.description: You can cast the enlarge/reduce spell once with this feature, using only the spell's enlarging effects, and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

description.p: Meat is chock full of protein in addition to containing many healthy minerals and nutrients. Cooked or raw, fatty or lean; there are many stories in Silverplate where pieces of meat star as the brave heroes.
You can breathe undewater.

sheet.description: You can breathe undewater.

description.p: Meat is chock full of protein in addition to containing many healthy minerals and nutrients. Cooked or raw, fatty or lean; there are many stories in Silverplate where pieces of meat star as the brave heroes.
Thanks to your ingredients, you have an increased chance of survival. You have a +1 bonus to Wisdom (Survival) checks.

Meat is chock full of protein in addition to containing many healthy minerals and nutrients. Cooked or raw, fatty or lean; there are many stories in Silverplate where pieces of meat star as the brave heroes.
While making an attack, you can use a reaction to channel your inner raw power and have advantage on the attack roll.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

sheet.description: While making an attack, you can use a reaction to channel your inner raw power and have advantage on the attack roll.

description.p: Meat is chock full of protein in addition to containing many healthy minerals and nutrients. Cooked or raw, fatty or lean; there are many stories in Silverplate where pieces of meat star as the brave heroes.

Your body is a temple dedicated to muscle-powered deities. You can flex your muscles and double your carrying capacity for 1 hour. Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

sheet.description: You can flex your muscles and double your carrying capacity for 1 hour.

description.p: A great addition to any healthy diet, dairy folk place great importance on preservation and maintenance of well-being. They are tough nuts to crack in combat and in life as they are famous for their durability. They try to ensure harmony and peace in the lives of others.
When you take damage, you can use a reaction to harden your body and lower the damage in an amount equal to ld8 plus your Constitution modifier.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Constitution modifier. You regain any expended uses when you finish a long rest.
This reduction increases to 2d8 at 9th and 3d8 at 18th level.

sheet.description: When you take damage, you can use a reaction to harden your body and lower the damage in an amount equal to ld8 plus {{constitution:modifier}}
When you take damage, you can use a reaction to harden your body and lower the damage in an amount equal to 2d8 plus {{constitution:modifier}}
When you take damage, you can use a reaction to harden your body and lower the damage in an amount equal to 3d8 plus {{constitution:modifier}}

description.p: A great addition to any healthy diet, dairy folk place great importance on preservation and maintenance of well-being. They are tough nuts to crack in combat and in life as they are famous for their durability. They try to ensure harmony and peace in the lives of others.
You have resistance to poison damage. Also, you can cast the detect poison and disease spell once with this feature, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast the detect poison and disease spell once with this feature.

description.p: A great addition to any healthy diet, dairy folk place great importance on preservation and maintenance of well-being. They are tough nuts to crack in combat and in life as they are famous for their durability. They try to ensure harmony and peace in the lives of others.
You can cast the sleep spell once with this feature, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast the sleep spell once with this feature.

description.p: A great addition to any healthy diet, dairy folk place great importance on preservation and maintenance of well-being. They are tough nuts to crack in combat and in life as they are famous for their durability. They try to ensure harmony and peace in the lives of others.

You can cast the disguise self spell once with this feature, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell, and you can only assume the form of another dairy product with this spell.

sheet.description: You can cast the disguise self spell once with this feature with Charisma and you can only assume the form of another dairy product with this spell.

description.p: A great addition to any healthy diet, dairy folk place great importance on preservation and maintenance of well-being. They are tough nuts to crack in combat and in life as they are famous for their durability. They try to ensure harmony and peace in the lives of others.
You have advantage on Charisma checks against foodfolk that have the Sweet character tag.

sheet.description: You have advantage on Charisma checks against foodfolk that have the Sweet character tag.

description.p: A great addition to any healthy diet, dairy folk place great importance on preservation and maintenance of well-being. They are tough nuts to crack in combat and in life as they are famous for their durability. They try to ensure harmony and peace in the lives of others.
You can live up to 450 years.

sheet.description: You can live up to 450 years.

description.p: A great addition to any healthy diet, dairy folk place great importance on preservation and maintenance of well-being. They are tough nuts to crack in combat and in life as they are famous for their durability. They try to ensure harmony and peace in the lives of others.
Your weight is halved.

sheet.description: Your weight is halved.

description.p: Baked/Roasted foodfolk prefer the heat, as they are born through fire and flames. They are often courageous and adventurous.
Your Charisma score increases by 1, up to a maximum of 20.
You can cast the charm person spell once with this feature, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

sheet.description: You can cast the charm person spell once with this feature with Charisma.

description.p: Baked/Roasted foodfolk prefer the heat, as they are born through fire and flames. They are often courageous and adventurous.
You are proficient with the great oven shovel and the oven shovel.
Also, while making a weapon attack using one of these weapons, you can use your reaction to have advantage on an attack roll.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain any expended uses when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: while making a weapon attack using a oven shovel or great oven shovel, you can use your reaction to have advantage on an attack roll.

description.p: Baked/Roasted foodfolk prefer the heat, as they are born through fire and flames. They are often courageous and adventurous.
Your carrying capacity is doubled.

sheet.description: Your carrying capacity is doubled.

description.p: Baked/Roasted foodfolk prefer the heat, as they are born through fire and flames. They are often courageous and adventurous.
You have lived most of your life as a piece of dough, experiencing many things and witnessing history itself. You have proficiency in the History skill.
Baked/Roasted foodfolk prefer the heat, as they are born through fire and flames. They are often courageous and adventurous.
You need less armor parts to cover the weak points of your body. You can buy nonmagical armor at half the price.

sheet.description: You need less armor parts to cover the weak points of your body. You can buy nonmagical armor at half the price.

description.p: Baked/Roasted foodfolk prefer the heat, as they are born through fire and flames. They are often courageous and adventurous.
You take half damage from falling.

sheet.description: You take half damage from falling.

description.p: Baked/Roasted foodfolk prefer the heat, as they are born through fire and flames. They are often courageous and adventurous.
You are unharmed by temperatures as high as 250 degrees Fahrenheit. Additionally, whenever you take fire damage, your inner heat reduces the damage by 1.

sheet.description: You are unharmed by temperatures as high as 250 degrees Fahrenheit. Additionally, whenever you take fire damage, your inner heat reduces the damage by 1.

description.p: Those who've been fried have endured the highest of temperatures and risen out of the sizzling oil stronger than ever. Free spirits with endless curiosity, fried foodfolk can be seen in every corner of Silverplate.

As an action, you cover yourself in deep fried oil that protects you from harm. You gain 10 temporary hit points for 8 hours. While you have the temporary hit points granted by this feature, weapon attacks rolls against you are made with disadvantage.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

sheet.description: As an action, you cover yourself in deep fried oil that protects you from harm. You gain 10 temporary hit points for 8 hours. While you have the temporary hit points granted by this feature, weapon attacks rolls against you are made with disadvantage.

description.p: Those who've been fried have endured the highest of temperatures and risen out of the sizzling oil stronger than ever. Free spirits with endless curiosity, fried foodfolk can be seen in every corner of Silverplate.

You can use your action to exhale frying energy. All creatures in a 15- foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC = 8 + your Constitution modifier + your proficiency bonus). A creature takes 2d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
This damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 6th level, 12th level, and 18th level.

sheet.description: You can use your action to exhale frying energy. All creatures in a 15- foot cone must make a DC {{vengeanceofthefried:dc}} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 2d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

You can use your action to exhale frying energy. All creatures in a 15- foot cone must make a DC {{vengeanceofthefried:dc}} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

You can use your action to exhale frying energy. All creatures in a 15- foot cone must make a DC {{vengeanceofthefried:dc}} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 4d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

description.p: Those who've been fried have endured the highest of temperatures and risen out of the sizzling oil stronger than ever. Free spirits with endless curiosity, fried foodfolk can be seen in every corner of Silverplate.

When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the scorching ray spell once with this feature and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

sheet.description: You can cast the scorching ray spell once with this feature with Charisma.

description.p: Those who've been fried have endured the highest of temperatures and risen out of the sizzling oil stronger than ever. Free spirits with endless curiosity, fried foodfolk can be seen in every corner of Silverplate.
You are proficient with the frying pan, the great frying pan, and throwing picks.

Those who've been fried have endured the highest of temperatures and risen out of the sizzling oil stronger than ever. Free spirits with endless curiosity, fried foodfolk can be seen in every corner of Silverplate.
You can read, speak, and write Deep Speech.

Those who've been fried have endured the highest of temperatures and risen out of the sizzling oil stronger than ever. Free spirits with endless curiosity, fried foodfolk can be seen in every corner of Silverplate.
Your jump distance is tripled.

sheet.description: Your jump distance is tripled.

description.p: Those who've been fried have endured the highest of temperatures and risen out of the sizzling oil stronger than ever. Free spirits with endless curiosity, fried foodfolk can be seen in every corner of Silverplate.
Creatures have disadvantage on Strength (Athletics) checks against you while grappling you.

sheet.description: Creatures have disadvantage on Strength (Athletics) checks against you while grappling you.

description.p: Molded inside piping hot water or divine steam, boiled and steamed foodfolk can use the heat trapped inside their bodies to protect themselves. They can thrive in and around water, and usually become guards, alchemists, or assassins.
As an action, you can release the steam inside you to hide. For 1 minute, creatures that rely on sight have disadvantage on attack rolls against you.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain any expended uses when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: As an action, you can release the steam inside you to hide. For 1 minute, creatures that rely on sight have disadvantage on attack rolls against you.

description.p: Molded inside piping hot water or divine steam, boiled and steamed foodfolk can use the heat trapped inside their bodies to protect themselves. They can thrive in and around water, and usually become guards, alchemists, or assassins.
The mystic powers of steam protect you against magic. When you fail a saving throw against a spell or other magical effect, you can choose to succeed instead.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

sheet.description: When you fail a saving throw against a spell or other magical effect, you can choose to succeed instead.

description.p: Molded inside piping hot water or divine steam, boiled and steamed foodfolk can use the heat trapped inside their bodies to protect themselves. They can thrive in and around water, and usually become guards, alchemists, or assassins.
You can cast the fog cloud spell once with this feature and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast the fog cloud spell once with this feature.

description.p: Molded inside piping hot water or divine steam, boiled and steamed foodfolk can use the heat trapped inside their bodies to protect themselves. They can thrive in and around water, and usually become guards, alchemists, or assassins.

While completely submerged in water, you regain 1 hit point at the end of each of your turns. You can't regain hit points in this way if your current hit points are more than half of your hit point maximum or you have O hit points.

sheet.description: While completely submerged in water, you regain 1 hit point at the end of each of your turns. You can't regain hit points in this way if your current hit points are more than half of your hit point maximum or you have O hit points.

element.name: Boiled/Steamed - Ancient Wisdom of Steam Masters (3)

description.p: Molded inside piping hot water or divine steam, boiled and steamed foodfolk can use the heat trapped inside their bodies to protect themselves. They can thrive in and around water, and usually become guards, alchemists, or assassins.
You are proficient with alchemist's supplies.

element.name: Boiled/Steamed - Art of the Dark Boiling (3)

description.p: Molded inside piping hot water or divine steam, boiled and steamed foodfolk can use the heat trapped inside their bodies to protect themselves. They can thrive in and around water, and usually become guards, alchemists, or assassins.
You are proficient with poisoner's kit.

Molded inside piping hot water or divine steam, boiled and steamed foodfolk can use the heat trapped inside their bodies to protect themselves. They can thrive in and around water, and usually become guards, alchemists, or assassins.
You are familiar with tastelessness because of overboiling. When you become tasteless, you can end the condition as an action. Once you use this feature, a week has to pass for you to use it again.

sheet.description: When you become tasteless, you can end the condition as an action.

description.p: Bursting with raw talent, fresh foodfolk are some of the most cheerful people of Silverplate. Full of vigor and vitality, they are living proof that one does not have to go through a range of procedures to be both strong and delicious.
You have advantage on the first ability check, attack roll, or saving throw you make after rolling for initiative.
Also, when you suffer exhaustion, you negate the effects of the last level of exhaustion you've taken, except for the effects of 6th level exhaustion.

sheet.description: You have advantage on the first ability check, attack roll, or saving throw you make after rolling for initiative. Also, when you suffer exhaustion, you negate the effects of the last level of exhaustion you've taken, except for the effects of 6th level exhaustion.

description.p: Bursting with raw talent, fresh foodfolk are some of the most cheerful people of Silverplate. Full of vigor and vitality, they are living proof that one does not have to go through a range of procedures to be both strong and delicious.
You have resistance to necrotic damage.

sheet.description: You have resistance to necrotic damage.

description.p: Bursting with raw talent, fresh foodfolk are some of the most cheerful people of Silverplate. Full of vigor and vitality, they are living proof that one does not have to go through a range of procedures to be both strong and delicious.
You can cast the detect poison and disease or purify food and drink spell once with this feature, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast the detect poison and disease or purify food and drink spell once with this feature.

description.p: Bursting with raw talent, fresh foodfolk are some of the most cheerful people of Silverplate. Full of vigor and vitality, they are living proof that one does not have to go through a range of procedures to be both strong and delicious.
You are proficient with the cutting knife and the wargrater.

Bursting with raw talent, fresh foodfolk are some of the most cheerful people of Silverplate. Full of vigor and vitality, they are living proof that one does not have to go through a range of procedures to be both strong and delicious.
You can read, speak, and write a language of your choice.

Bursting with raw talent, fresh foodfolk are some of the most cheerful people of Silverplate. Full of vigor and vitality, they are living proof that one does not have to go through a range of procedures to be both strong and delicious.
You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects that decrease your ability scores or that give disadvantage on your ability checks.

sheet.description: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects that decrease your ability scores or that give disadvantage on your ability checks.

description.p: Bursting with raw talent, fresh foodfolk are some of the most cheerful people of Silverplate. Full of vigor and vitality, they are living proof that one does not have to go through a range of procedures to be both strong and delicious.
If you fail a saving throw against a spell or another magical effect that deals necrotic damage, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

sheet.description: If you fail a saving throw against a spell or another magical effect that deals necrotic damage, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

description.p: Dried foodfolk have lost a certain degree of water. However, this is not a deficiency, but a miracle of life. They can live longer than most other foodfolk, and the sun doesn't have as much of an adverse effect on them.
You regain ld4 hit points at the start of your turn if you have at least l hit point. You can regain up to 50 hit points using this feature. You regain any expended uses when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You regain ld4 hit points at the start of your turn if you have at least l hit point. You can regain up to 50 hit points using this feature.

description.p: Dried foodfolk have lost a certain degree of water. However, this is not a deficiency, but a miracle of life. They can live longer than most other foodfolk, and the sun doesn't have as much of an adverse effect on them.
Your size is Small. Your speed increases by 5 feet, and you can take the Dash action as a bonus action.

sheet.description: Your size is Small. Your speed increases by 5 feet, and you can take the Dash action as a bonus action

description.p: Dried foodfolk have lost a certain degree of water. However, this is not a deficiency, but a miracle of life. They can live longer than most other foodfolk, and the sun doesn't have as much of an adverse effect on them.
You can cast the barkskin spell once with this feature, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast the barkskin spell once with this feature.

description.p: Dried foodfolk have lost a certain degree of water. However, this is not a deficiency, but a miracle of life. They can live longer than most other foodfolk, and the sun doesn't have as much of an adverse effect on them.
You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks under bright light and sunlight.

sheet.description: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks under bright light and sunlight.

element.name: Dried - Long Live the Dry King/Queen (3)

description.p: Dried foodfolk have lost a certain degree of water. However, this is not a deficiency, but a miracle of life. They can live longer than most other foodfolk, and the sun doesn't have as much of an adverse effect on them.
You can live up to 400 years instead of 200.

sheet.description: You can live up to 400 years instead of 200.

description.p: Dried foodfolk have lost a certain degree of water. However, this is not a deficiency, but a miracle of life. They can live longer than most other foodfolk, and the sun doesn't have as much of an adverse effect on them.
You have advantage on saving throws against exhaustion while walking for long distances without taking a rest.

sheet.description: You have advantage on saving throws against exhaustion while walking for long distances without taking a rest.

element.name: Dried - Most Endurant of All Food (3)

description.p: Dried foodfolk have lost a certain degree of water. However, this is not a deficiency, but a miracle of life. They can live longer than most other foodfolk, and the sun doesn't have as much of an adverse effect on them.
When you take damage from a nonmagical attack, you take 1 damage less. When you reach 10th level, you take 1 damage less from magical attacks as well.

sheet.description: When you take damage from a nonmagical attack, you take 1 damage less.
When you take damage from a nonmagical or magical attacks, you take 1 damage less.

description.p: Grilled/smoked foodfolk carry the fire of creation within. Some of the bravest and hardiest of foodfolk, the grilled and the smoked are no stranger to fire or hardship. They live their life to the fullest, and use their burning passion to achieve their goals.
You have resistance to fire damage.

Grilled/smoked foodfolk carry the fire of creation within. Some of the bravest and hardiest of foodfolk, the grilled and the smoked are no stranger to fire or hardship. They live their life to the fullest, and use their burning passion to achieve their goals.

As a bonus action, you send your thoughts to a creature of your choice within 60 feet of you, as a barely visible cloud of smoke. This way, you can communicate with the target telepathically even if you don't share a language. However, the target must be able to understand a language.

sheet.description: As a bonus action, you send your thoughts to a creature of your choice within 60 feet of you, as a barely visible cloud of smoke. This way, you can communicate with the target telepathically even if you don't share a language. However, the target must be able to understand a language.

description.p: Grilled/smoked foodfolk carry the fire of creation within. Some of the bravest and hardiest of foodfolk, the grilled and the smoked are no stranger to fire or hardship. They live their life to the fullest, and use their burning passion to achieve their goals.
As a bonus action, you surround yourself with smoke for 1 minute. For the duration, you have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

sheet.description: As a bonus action, you surround yourself with smoke for 1 minute. For the duration, you have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

description.p: Grilled/smoked foodfolk carry the fire of creation within. Some of the bravest and hardiest of foodfolk, the grilled and the smoked are no stranger to fire or hardship. They live their life to the fullest, and use their burning passion to achieve their goals.
You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

sheet.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

element.name: Grilled/Smoked - Fuel For Your Own Flames (3)

description.p: Grilled/smoked foodfolk carry the fire of creation within. Some of the bravest and hardiest of foodfolk, the grilled and the smoked are no stranger to fire or hardship. They live their life to the fullest, and use their burning passion to achieve their goals.
You know which wood is best for grilling. You are proficient with woodcarver's tools.

element.name: Grilled/Smoked - Acolyte of Smoke and Flames (3)

description.p: Grilled/smoked foodfolk carry the fire of creation within. Some of the bravest and hardiest of foodfolk, the grilled and the smoked are no stranger to fire or hardship. They live their life to the fullest, and use their burning passion to achieve their goals.
You know Ignan.

Grilled/smoked foodfolk carry the fire of creation within. Some of the bravest and hardiest of foodfolk, the grilled and the smoked are no stranger to fire or hardship. They live their life to the fullest, and use their burning passion to achieve their goals.
You are beloved by the divine, or at least the people around you think so. People believe that funerals, weddings, or other gatherings you witness are blessed by the gods.

sheet.description: You are beloved by the divine, or at least the people around you think so. People believe that funerals, weddings, or other gatherings you witness are blessed by the gods.

description.p: Mixed in the great bowl of creation, Blended/Squeezed foodfolk are the sum of all the ingredients that create them. Flexible folk, they are able to blend in everywhere.
You have resistance to one of the following damage types of your choice; bludgeoning or slashing.
Mixed in the great bowl of creation, Blended/Squeezed foodfolk are the sum of all the ingredients that create them. Flexible folk, they are able to blend in everywhere.
When you suffer a critical hit, you can choose to suffer a normal hit instead by relocating your ingredients as a reaction.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

sheet.description: When you suffer a critical hit, you can choose to suffer a normal hit instead by relocating your ingredients as a reaction.

description.p: Mixed in the great bowl of creation, Blended/Squeezed foodfolk are the sum of all the ingredients that create them. Flexible folk, they are able to blend in everywhere.

At the end of each long rest, you gain the benefits of a feature of your choice from this list (Foodfolk tags), losing the benefits of the previous feature. However, the chosen feature must be worth 3 points.

sheet.description: At the end of each long rest, you gain the benefits of a feature of your choice from this list (Foodfolk tags), losing the benefits of the previous feature. However, the chosen feature must be worth 3 points.

description.p: Mixed in the great bowl of creation, Blended/Squeezed foodfolk are the sum of all the ingredients that create them. Flexible folk, they are able to blend in everywhere.
You can cast the color spray spell once with this feature, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast the color spray spell once with this feature.

description.p: Mixed in the great bowl of creation, Blended/Squeezed foodfolk are the sum of all the ingredients that create them. Flexible folk, they are able to blend in everywhere.
You have advantage on Charisma checks against fresh people.
Mixed in the great bowl of creation, Blended/Squeezed foodfolk are the sum of all the ingredients that create them. Flexible folk, they are able to blend in everywhere.
You can read, speak, and write a language of your choice.
Mixed in the great bowl of creation, Blended/Squeezed foodfolk are the sum of all the ingredients that create them. Flexible folk, they are able to blend in everywhere.
You can make a Charisma (Performance) check instead of a Dexterity (Stealth) check to hide in crowds.

sheet.description: You can make a Charisma (Performance) check instead of a Dexterity (Stealth) check to hide in crowds.
